content: **materials ** * 2 skeins of color a * 2 skeins of color b only 1 skein if omitting fringe * crochet hook size p-15 10 mm * large-eyed blunt needle want to chat about your project or have a pattern question join the edie eckman stitchers 1 group like to crochet work through unusual motif designs at the beyond the square crochet-along 2 knit version can be found at http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/pocket-scarf-to-knit-or-crochet-knit-version 1 http //www ravelry com/groups/edie-eckman-stitchers 2 http //www ravelry com/groups/bts-crochet-motif-cal
